excerpt.short: We are an Orthodox Christian community of disciples of Jesus Christ… an ancient vine with 2000 year old roots and 21st century fruit, borne forth in Los Angeles.
In this 5 ½ minute video, “Orthodox on Purpose,” people from all walks of life share what they came to experience in the Orthodox Christian Faith.
Discover more about Orthodox Christianity. Get connected. Find the Nursery. Get your kids into Sunday School. Find out what’s going on in worship. Find ministries.
In this 10 minute video, Zach, from Soul Pancake’s  “Have a Little Faith,” meets with Noah Johnson and our Cathedral’s Young Adult FORUM to explore Orthodox Christianity.

excerpt.short: What if there is another way…one that you’ve not considered before.  In this thoughtful, 3 minute video, Fr John Bakas helps us to explore the possibility that there may very well be another side of Christianity that deserves your full consideration.
